caption.title: Carbon data from Late Cretaceous fossil bone, mudstone, topsoil, and younger bone.

tr.td: Matrix-surrounded subterranean Centrosaurus bone core (surface scraped prior to powdering)
Adjacent mudstone matrix of subterranean Centrosaurus bone
Topsoil on same ridge and ~ 64 m above BB180
Mudstone on same ridge and ~ 23 m above BB180
Surface-eroded Late Cretaceous bone core on same ridge and ~ 21 m above BB180 (surface scraped prior to powdering)
Yarnton bovine right femur (82–71 ka, Cook et al., 2012)

fn.p: *This sample was used for blank correction in the AMS analyses, therefore this value is not blank-subtracted.
